name: SharesGram
description: What is the project about? You candiscover the core features and capabilities that SocialFi enthusiasts have been waiting for. Manage shares : Create, Search any share created on Telegram, with a username. Trading : You will be able to buy and sell any shares created on SharesGram Communities : You will be able to create or to join any community linked to a Telegram username. If you own a share, you can create as much communities as you want that will be unified with your single Telegram username. What makes your project unique? SharesGram is the first SocialFi protocol built on Telegram that allow the creation of gated communities fully automatized. History of your project. SharesGram launched as a complete protocol, and is looking to expand partnerships and features in the future. Whatâ€™s next for your project? SharesGram plans to be the place to be on Telegram, the gateway to SocialFi, the bridge between communities and users. What can your token be used for? SharesGram token holders can benefit advantages as revenue sharing, and an access to some of the most famous communities gated.
